summary: Website for taking a Class 9 History MCQ test on "Socialism in Europe and the Russian Revolution" with topic-focused questions, difficulty progression (easy to hard), and a final score out of 50.

existing_features.title: Create an MCQ test experience for Class 9 History chapter “Socialism in Europe and the Russian Revolution” focused on the topics: (1) The First World War and the Russian Empire, (2) The February Revolution and Petrograd, and (3) After February.
Implement a full test flow where the user answers MCQs and receives a final score out of 50 when the test ends.
Provide a question set that progresses from easy to hard difficulty across the test (earlier questions easier, later questions harder).

Frontend: build a clean test-taking UI with (1) a start screen describing the chapter/topics and total score out of 50, (2) a question screen with answer selection and navigation, and (3) an end screen showing the final score out of 50 and an option to restart the test.
Add a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the quiz site (colors, typography, layout) and apply it consistently across all screens; do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Add the generated static image asset(s) to the frontend and render them in the UI (served from frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website that delivers an MCQ test for Class 9 History chapter "Socialism in Europe and the Russian Revolution" (topics include WWI and the Russian Empire, February Revolution and Petrograd, and events after February).
Allow the user to answer MCQ questions in a proper test format and show a final score out of 50 at the end.
Include questions that progress from easy to hard difficulty.

Backend: store and serve the MCQ question bank (including topic, difficulty, options, and correct answer) from the single Motoko actor, and provide a scoring mechanism that returns the final score out of 50 based on submitted answers.
